terminologie_extrait.definition: that level of speed, quickness, and spin (done consistently) that overwhelms a given opponent
terminologie_extrait.contexte: used to describe the ideal playing level for an individual player

larry_line.probleme: Play just above your opponent's Larry Line to overwhelm them and force defensive play

debutant.description: Focus on consistent spin and speed to raise your Larry Line

exercices_complementaires.description: Use early attacks to end the point before getting into losing rallies

metriques_progression: Raise your Larry Line through practice
